summary: Adds 30 collars in 10 Colors for you to pick from. They come in copper, gold or silver and are for males and females alike.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
---------------
This mod adds 30 collars in 10 colors for you to pick from. They come in copper, gold or silver and are for males and females alike.

To get them, either use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905]AddItemMenu[/url] or open the console and find out the ID of your desired collar by typing: "help collar". Once you found the ID you can add it with the command: player.additem XXXXXXXX 1 (while XXXXXXXX is the ID you got and 1 the number of item(s) you want.)

They should work with all bodymods and races.


Install:
---------------
Use the modmanger of your choice or extract the files to your Skyrim data directory.


Uninstall:
------------
Delete "Colored Collars.esp", "Colored Collars.bsa" and "Colored Collars.bsl" from Skyrim\data


Known issues:
-----------------
May have some clipping under certain movements if your neck is too FAT :p


Disclaimer and credits:
----------------------------
No I didn't make them, I just retextured them and added them all to the game and packed everything into a bsa file rather for practising.
All credits go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4162161]gatti2012[/url]
And just for the records: I am not keeping Argonian houseslaves, even it if looks like it! ;)
author: Kuschel-Drow
